name: CliffCart
description:
This is my first attempt for Ludum Dare!  I'm still a beginner so I went really simple.

The game is a clicker, arcade style game. The cart will inevitably fall to its demise, but how long can you keep it running?

-Click coin on top right to get, well, coins.

-Use coins to buy rails, they  become more expensive each time.

-You can use a fire spell to slow down the cart for 5 seconds. It will take a 10 second cooldown to be used again, but price remains static.

-Bottom right you can upgrade your clicking power.

-Random coins will spawn, their rewards grow with each grab, but they also bring misfortune as the cart gains speed every time a new coin spawns.
